title: Dual-Language Science Education Program Design: Simulation/VR Learning Based on Interlingual Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: A program for science teachers and educators to learn effective lesson design in a bilingual (Korean-English) environment, using simulation/VR tools in a BYOD setting to facilitate language interaction

learning_goals: Learners acquire 50 core vocabulary terms needed to explain scientific concepts in bilingual environments through cross-linguistic interaction
Learners apply linguistic conflict resolution strategies in VR simulations to solve scientific problems with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can develop an interactive lesson model where they explain science experiment procedures in both their native language and the target language through group activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
